drugbank_database.description: Comprehensive DrugBank database with medicine information, dosages, and therapeutic data

drugs.name: Lepirudin
drugs.description: Lepirudin is a recombinant hirudin derivative. It is a highly specific, irreversible inhibitor of thrombin. It is used for anticoagulation in patients with heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (HIT).
drugs.indication: For the treatment of thrombosis and to prevent thromboembolic complications in patients with heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (HIT) and associated thromboembolic disease.
